original_text: And Moses went out, and told the people the words of the Lord, and gathered the seventy men of the elders of the people, and set them round about the tabernacle.
korean_text: 모세가 나가서 여호와의 말씀을 백성에게 알리고 백성의 장로 칠십 인을 모아 장막에 둘러 세우매

sentences.original_text: and told the people the words of the Lord
and gathered the seventy men of the elders of the people
and set them round about the tabernacle
